alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 2:02AM MDT until April 07 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...The Custer County Plains, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, the Southern Meade County Plains and the Rapid City area. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected this morning, with up to an inch of accumulation possible. The combination of snowfall and areas of blowing snow may impact travel.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
